results.title: Simvastatin increases circulating endothelial progenitor cells and inhibits the formation of intracranial aneurysms in rats with diet-induced hyperhomocysteinemia.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ increased levels of circulating EPCs and decreased @GENE_NOS2 @GENE_24599 @@@iNOS@@@, @GENE_MMP2 @GENE_81686 @@@MMP-2@@@, @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_81687 @@@MMP-9@@@ and @GENE_VEGFA @GENE_83785 @@@VEGF@@@ mRNA levels, while increased @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_24600 @@@eNOS@@@ mRNA in @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysmal@@@ tissue.

citations.NLM: Xu Y, Zhang B, Chen Y, Wang X, Li Y, Wu J, Dong H, Wang S. Simvastatin increases circulating endothelial progenitor cells and inhibits the formation of intracranial aneurysms in rats with diet-induced hyperhomocysteinemia. Neurosci Lett. 2021 Aug 24;760():136072. PMID: 34147541
citations.BibTeX: @article{34147541, title={Simvastatin increases circulating endothelial progenitor cells and inhibits the formation of intracranial aneurysms in rats with diet-induced hyperhomocysteinemia.}, author={Xu Y and Zhang B and Chen Y and Wang X and Li Y and Wu J and Dong H and Wang S}, journal={Neurosci Lett}, volume={760}, pages={136072}}

results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Formation Favoured by Lack of Nrf2 Transcriptional Activity
results.text_hl: It revealed a positive correlation between @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysm@@@ size and @GENE_NQO1 @GENE_1728 @@@NQO1@@@ level among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ administered with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (Figure 7(e):black, Spearman's correlation r = 0.6620, p < 0.001, n = 28).

citations.NLM: Kopacz A, Werner E, Grochot-Przęczek A, Klóska D, Hajduk K, Neumayer C, Józkowicz A, Piechota-Polanczyk A. Simvastatin Attenuates Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Formation Favoured by Lack of Nrf2 Transcriptional Activity Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2020;2020():6340190. PMID: 32617140

results.title: Clinical evidence of efficacy of simvastatin for aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage
results.text_hl: Routine prescription of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysmal@@@ @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@SAH@@@ might not be beneficial.

citations.NLM: Lin J, Liu H, Jiang J, Jia C, Zhang B, Gao X. Clinical evidence of efficacy of simvastatin for aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage J Int Med Res. 2017 Dec;45(6):2128-2138. PMID: 28661267

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates the activity of matrix metalloprotease-9 in aneurysmal aortic tissue.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates the activity of matrix metalloprotease-9 in @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysmal@@@ aortic tissue.

results.title: Simvastatin suppresses experimental aortic aneurysm expansion.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may be useful as an adjuvant therapy to suppress the growth of small @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysms@@@.

citations.NLM: Kalyanasundaram A, Elmore JR, Manazer JR, Golden A, Franklin DP, Galt SW, Zakhary EM, Carey DJ. Simvastatin suppresses experimental aortic aneurysm expansion. J Vasc Surg. 2006 Jan;43(1):117-24. PMID: 16414398

results.title: Simvastatin suppresses the progression of experimentally induced cerebral aneurysms in rats.
results.text_hl: To examine whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has a suppressive effect on preexisting @DISEASE_Intracranial_Aneurysm @DISEASE_MESH:D002532 @@@CAs@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration started at 1 month after @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysm@@@ induction.

results.title: Comparison of bare metal and statin-coated coils on rates of intra-aneurysmal tissue organization in a rat model of aneurysm.
results.journal: J Biomed Mater Res B Appl Biomater
results.text_hl: We suggest that coating coils with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ effectively accelerated organization within the @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysms@@@ and endothelialization over the coil.

citations.NLM: Kodama T, Iwata H. Comparison of bare metal and statin-coated coils on rates of intra-aneurysmal tissue organization in a rat model of aneurysm. J Biomed Mater Res B Appl Biomater. 2013 May;101(4):656-62. PMID: 23359484

results.title: Neurofibromin-deficient myeloid cells are critical mediators of aneurysm formation in vivo.
results.text_hl: Finally, oral administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or the antioxidant @CHEMICAL_acetovanillone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C056165 @@@apocynin@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysm@@@ formation in @GENE_NF1 @GENE_18015 @@@Nf1@@@(+/-) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Effect of High-Dose Simvastatin on Cerebral Blood Flow and Static Autoregulation in Subarachnoid Hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Statin-naive @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ admitted <72 h after WFNS >=2 @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysmal@@@ @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@SAH@@@ were randomly assigned to 80 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/day or placebo for 21 days.

citations.NLM: Diringer MN, Dhar R, Scalfani M, Zazulia AR, Chicoine M, Powers WJ, Derdeyn CP. Effect of High-Dose Simvastatin on Cerebral Blood Flow and Static Autoregulation in Subarachnoid Hemorrhage. Neurocrit Care. 2016 Aug;25(1):56-63. PMID: 26721259

results.title: Statins promote the growth of experimentally induced cerebral aneurysms in estrogen-deficient rats.
results.text_hl: The effects of @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ (5, 25, or 50 mg/kg per day) and of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (5 mg/kg per day) on their @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysms@@@ were studied.
